name: AVPlayerLooper
desc: An object that loops media content using a queue player.

items.name: init(player: AVQueuePlayer, templateItem: AVPlayerItem, timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a player looper instance to repeat the specified time range of a player item using a queue player.

items.name: init(player: AVQueuePlayer, templateItem: AVPlayerItem)
items.desc: Returns a player looper instance configured to loop the full duration of the specified player item in the queue player.

items.name: var loopingPlayerItems: [AVPlayerItem]
items.desc: An array containing replicas of the template player item used to accomplish the looping.

items.name: func disableLooping()
items.desc: Disables looping for the player queue.

items.name: var loopCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the object played the media.

items.name: var status: AVPlayerLooper.Status
items.desc: A status that indicates the objectâ€™s ability to loop playback.

items.name: enum AVPlayerLooper.Status
items.desc: Status constants that indicate whether a looper can successfully perform looping playback.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error that describes the reason looping failed.
